headline: Chevron Reshapes Middle East Portfolio With West Qurna 2 And Jafurah Moves
summary: Chevron (NYSE:CVX) is in exclusive talks to acquire a stake in Iraq's West Qurna 2 oilfield after Lukoil's divestment linked to US sanctions. The company has also secured condensate shipments from Saudi Aramco's Jafurah gas project. Together, these moves indicate a reset of Chevron's global upstream portfolio and supplier relationships across the Middle East. For you as an investor, these developments show Chevron reshaping where and how it sources future production. West Qurna 2 is...
